snippet: The Museum of Modern Art’s controversial decision to demolish a neighbor, the former American Folk Art Museum, is about to become reality.
abstract: Museum of Modern Art is about to begin controversial demolition of former American Folk Art Museum at 45 West 53rd Street in Midtown Manhattan; MoMA plans to use former folk art space to expand its galleries, in project that includes renovation of museum's main building.
lead_paragraph: The Museum of Modern Art’s controversial decision to demolish a neighbor, the former American Folk Art Museum, is about to become reality.

headline.main: Coming Soon to MoMA, Lots of Knocking Next Door
headline.print_headline: Coming Soon to MoMA, Lots of Knocking Next Door
